input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Unobserved confounders has a direct effect on drug taken and cholesterol level. Treatment assignment has a direct effect on drug taken. Drug taken has a direct effect on cholesterol level. Unobserved confounders is unobserved. The overall probability of taking of all assigned drugs is 62%. The probability of not taking of any assigned drugs and low cholesterol is 15%. The probability of taking of all assigned drugs and low cholesterol is 32%. Is the chance of low cholesterol smaller when observing taking of all assigned drugs?
